segments.text: I see the way the woman is lost in her own world, drying the plate as if nothing else exists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s amusing to watch the kids, their little teamwork unfolding in secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I feel a knot in my stomach as the boy leans farther over the edge of the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His precarious balance is mesmerizing yet terrifying; will he fall?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hopeful expression makes my heart warm, but it’s tinged with worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly believe the woman hasn’t looked up once; it's like she’s in another universe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the impending chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and shake her, imploring her to look around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene is charming yet fraught with danger, and it feels surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: When will she notice? Or will it take a small disaster for her to see?
segments.speaker: PAR
